inputs.selection_motivation: Wearable technology stress measurement directly generates high-frequency physiological data, making it a primary driver of smart data capture capabilities within health tech ecosystems.
inputs.candidate_motivation: These topics are the closest adjacent domains—biometric health analytics, health data capture, and AI-enabled health tech—that would plausibly influence, correlate with, or compete with wearable stress measurement. They cover market dynamics, cross-domain collaborations, and advanced data interpretation that directly relate to wearable stress data.

proposed_link.motivation: Wearable technology stress measurement directly generates high-frequency physiological data, making it a primary driver of smart data capture capabilities within health tech ecosystems.
